de.mnl.osgi.bnd.maven

Class MergingMavenRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • aQute.maven.provider.MavenRepository
      • de.mnl.osgi.bnd.maven.MergingMavenRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    aQute.maven.api.IMavenRepo, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class MergingMavenRepository
extends aQute.maven.provider.MavenRepository
implements aQute.maven.api.IMavenRepo, Closeable
    Provides a common IMavenRepo view on several MavenBackingRepository instances.

    The class extends MavenRepository which lacks some required functionality.
